name: The Artificial Intelligence Conference
content: Do you have AI experience to share? We're looking for groundbreaking business applications, compelling use cases, rock-solid technical skills, tear-downs of successful AI projects and dissections of failures--and maybe one or two truly crazy ideas that just might change the world. Send us your best ideas for a chance to be on stage in front of the brightest minds in AI. We're seeking both technical and non-technical presentations in these key topic areas: -AI in the enterprise: Executive Briefings, case studies and use cases, industry-specific applications -The impact of AI on business and society: automation, safety, regulation -Implementing AI projects: applications, tools, architecture, security -Interacting with AI: design, metrics, product management, bots -Models and methods: algorithms, vision/speech/emotion, deep learning, data, training
